author: Jason Bordoff
title: How Big Data Changes the Economics of Renewable Energy - The Experts - WSJ
text:
How Big Data Changes the Economics of Renewable Energy By Biography Jason Bordoff Sep 23, 2016 11:45 am ET 
Jason Bordoff (@JasonBordoff), a former energy adviser to President Obama, is a professor of professional practice in international and public affairs and founding director of the Center on Global Energy Policy at Columbia University. Thanks to the exponential growth of information commonly known as “big data” and our increasingly sophisticated methods to analyze it, the […]
